definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: This cup stand has a characteristic creamy-white colour.
sentences.chinese: 这杯立场的一个特点乳白的颜色。

sentences.english: The main symptom is creamy white legions in the mouth that can be scraped away.
sentences.chinese: 其主要症状是在口腔中产生大量可刮除的乳白色物体。

sentences.english: Preliminary inheritance results show that only one pair of recessive nuclear genes control the Pmw trait.
sentences.chinese: 经初步遗传分析，该乳白花性状由单隐性核基因控制。

sentences.english: He reached for it with both hands and stirred up the milky mud at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 他用双手去捉，把水底的乳白色泥浆全搅浑了。

sentences.english: Ding Shaozao white porcelain body thin, creamy white glaze, looks fine.
sentences.chinese: 定窑烧造的白瓷胎薄，釉色乳白，造型精美。

sentences.english: The opaque silica glass is produced by gas-emulsion technology.
sentences.chinese: 采用气相乳浊工艺生产乳白石英玻璃。

sentences.english: It used a lead wire weight at tip . On surface is white PVC Shrink Tubing.
sentences.chinese: 翼尖有铅条配重，表面蒙乳白色热缩膜。

sentences.english: Now droops the milk white peacock like a ghost.
sentences.chinese: 乳白色的孔雀幽灵般消沉。

sentences.english: Afterwards sees small ulcer after hair infection, fetid is ivory purulent sex secretion.
sentences.chinese: 继发感染后可见小溃疡，有恶臭的乳白色脓性分泌物。

sentences.english: The chalky scales that cover coccolithophores color the water milky white or bright blue.
sentences.chinese: 覆盖白垩表的颗石藻将水面染成乳白色或者浅蓝色。

sentences.english: Dingzhou porcelain is usually creamy white, though it is also made in other colours.
sentences.chinese: 定州陶瓷乳白色，当然其中也有其它颜色。

sentences.english: California dogtooth violet with creamy white flowers sometimes yellow-tinged.
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州的一种赤莲，花乳白色，有时淡黄色。

sentences.english: The cove, a young girl"s scream sliced into ivory mornings."
sentences.chinese: 天色微明，一个少女的尖叫划破了乳白色的晨曦。

sentences.english: Hanging from the walls were large cylindrical shapes, opalescent and organic.
sentences.chinese: 从墙壁悬挂是大的圆筒形的形状，乳白光的和有机的。

sentences.english: A milky twilight crept about the stairway and the landings below.
sentences.chinese: 乳白的黄昏蹑进楼梯和下面的楼梯口。

sentences.english: Jupiter is that blazing point of light near tonight'swaxing gibbous moon.
sentences.chinese: 今晚木星乳白色的新月边散发着光芒。
